markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 35 2.0 **Price** 350 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 **Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48) --- This fleshy _[+1 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2861) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)_ is obviously crafted from the tentacle of some fearsome beast, likely an aqudel, and constantly strobes with small patterns of light. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=662), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** Your last action was a successful [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) with the _alghollthu whip_; **Effect** Patterns on the skin of the whip strobe in a rapid pulse. The creature your attack succeeded against must attempt a DC 23 Will save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) until the end of your next turn.
**Failure** The target is dazzled until the end of your next turn and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93) 1.
**Critical Failure** The target is dazzled until the end of your next turn and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93) 2. **Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a tentacle from an aqudel.
name: Alghollthu Lash

Activate Single Action (concentrate, occult, visual) Frequency once per day; Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike, Grapple, or Trip with the alghollthu whip ; Effect Patterns on the skin of the whip strobe in a rapid pulse. The creature your attack succeeded against must attempt a DC 23 Will save. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target is dazzled until the end of your next turn. Failure The target is dazzled until the end of your next turn and stunned 1. Critical Failure The target is dazzled until the end of your next turn and stunned 2. Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include a tentacle from an aqudel.
